001
002package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.node;
003
004import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.StaticContext;
005import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.format.IPathFormatter;
006import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IAtomicValuedItem;
007import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.type.IItemType;
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.type.IKindTest;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.IFlagDefinition;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.IFlagInstance;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.qname.IEnhancedQName;
012
013import java.net.URI;
014import java.util.Collection;
015import java.util.Collections;
016import java.util.List;
017import java.util.stream.Stream;
018
019import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
020import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.Nullable;
021
022/**
023 * A Metapath node valued item representing a Metaschema module flag.
024 */
025
026public interface IFlagNodeItem
027    extends IDefinitionNodeItem<IFlagDefinition, IFlagInstance>, IAtomicValuedItem {
028  @Override
029  default NodeItemKind getNodeItemKind() {
030    return NodeItemKind.FLAG;
031  }
032
033  @Override
034  default IFlagNodeItem getNodeItem() {
035    return this;
036  }
037
038  @Override
039  IFlagDefinition getDefinition();
040
041  @Override
042  IFlagInstance getInstance();
043
044  @Override
045  default IKindTest<IFlagNodeItem> getType() {
046    StaticContext staticContext = getStaticContext();
047    return IItemType.flag(
048        getQName(),
049        getDefinition().getDefinitionQName().toEQName(staticContext),
050        staticContext);
051  }
052
053  @Override
054  @Nullable
055  default URI getBaseUri() {
056    INodeItem parent = getParentNodeItem();
057    return parent == null ? null : parent.getBaseUri();
058  }
059
060  /**
061   * FlagContainer do not have flag items. This call should return an empty
062   * collection.
063   */
064  @SuppressWarnings("null")
065  @Override
066  default Collection<? extends IFlagNodeItem> getFlags() {
067    // a flag does not have flags
068    return Collections.emptyList();
069  }
070
071  /**
072   * FlagContainer do not have flag items. This call should return {@code null}.
073   */
074  @Override
075  default IFlagNodeItem getFlagByName(@NonNull IEnhancedQName name) {
076    // a flag does not have flags
077    return null;
078  }
079
080  /**
081   * FlagContainer do not have flag items. This call should return an empty
082   * stream.
083   */
084  @SuppressWarnings("null")
085  @Override
086  default @NonNull
087  Stream<? extends IFlagNodeItem> flags() {
088    // a flag does not have flags
089    return Stream.empty();
090  }
091
092  /**
093   * FlagContainer do not have model items. This call should return an empty
094   * collection.
095   */
096  @SuppressWarnings("null")
097  @Override
098  default @NonNull
099  Collection<? extends List<? extends IModelNodeItem<?, ?>>> getModelItems() {
100    // a flag does not have model items
101    return Collections.emptyList();
102  }
103
104  /**
105   * FlagContainer do not have model items. This call should return an empty list.
106   */
107  @SuppressWarnings("null")
108  @Override
109  default List<? extends IModelNodeItem<?, ?>> getModelItemsByName(IEnhancedQName name) {
110    // a flag does not have model items
111    return Collections.emptyList();
112  }
113
114  /**
115   * FlagContainer do not have model items. This call should return an empty
116   * stream.
117   */
118  @SuppressWarnings("null")
119  @NonNull
120  @Override
121  default Stream<? extends IModelNodeItem<?, ?>> modelItems() {
122    // a flag does not have model items
123    return Stream.empty();
124  }
125
126  @Override
127  default @NonNull
128  String format(@NonNull IPathFormatter formatter) {
129    return formatter.formatFlag(this);
130  }
131
132  @Override
133  default <CONTEXT, RESULT> RESULT accept(@NonNull INodeItemVisitor<CONTEXT, RESULT> visitor, CONTEXT context) {
134    return visitor.visitFlag(this, context);
135  }
136}
